summary: A college freshman begins to notice that students at her new school are losing their individuality. She discovers that the faculty are operating on the students' brains to make them docile and productive, but she's having non of it.
cast: Virginia Madsen|Richard Cox|Kay E. Kuter|James Wilder|Sherilyn Fenn|Paul Feig|Scott Coffey|Paul Williams|Henry Sutton|Christopher Peters|Clare Carey|Christopher Crews|John Sack|Susan Barnes|Abigail Hanness|Arvid Holmberg|Walter Addison|Dan Garrity|John Cook|Tom Sheppard|Phil Weinstock|Kent Snyder Jr.|Diana Lands|Brett Gathrid|Alan Milligan|Diana Darby|Gary Maynard|Phil Tracy|Sam Ginsberg|Brass Adams|Gilbert Purvis|Kevin 'Kipper' Jones|Derrick Organ|Thomas Organ|Jay|Hugh Kelly|Lisa Smith|Janet Caggliano|Dennis Nolette|Buzz Hays|Bob Ducsay|Kirk Bodyfelt|Leslie Ann Bushka|Lisa Cach|Mark Decew|Carey Gerwig|Michael E. Gretza|John Hrovat|Adam Litman|Kyle Markgraf|Sean Nevett|Will Plyler|Eric Stachowski|Dawn Thompson|Melissa Toy|Rick White|Stephanie Willis|Tommy Organ
title: La universidad de los zombis
